snippet: Although the defendant, Xu Zhiyong, believes the outcome is a foregone conclusion, he will still fight the accusations in court, his lawyers said.
abstract: Trial is set to begin for Xu Zhiyong, one of China's most prominent human rights activists, and his lawyer says he will fight charges although he believes that his conviction is all but certain.
lead_paragraph: Although the defendant, Xu Zhiyong, believes the outcome is a foregone conclusion, he will still fight the accusations in court, his lawyers said.

headline.main: Trial Begins Next Week for Human Rights Activist in China
headline.print_headline: Trial Begins Next Week for Activist in China

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
